name: slidenswap
author: Asaf Zamir

sections.description:
Create image galleries with simple panning and zooming effects (something like the Ken Burns effect)

This is how the gallery looks like in action:

More info: http://www.github.com/AZdv/slidenswap
sections.installation:
Installing “SlideNSwap” can be done either by searching for “SlideNSwapgo” via the “Plugins > Add New” screen in your WordPress dashboard, or by using the following steps:

  1. Download the plugin via WordPress.org
  2. Upload the ZIP file through the ‘Plugins > Add New > Upload’ screen in your WordPress dashboard
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Go to SlideNSwap Settings and define your gallery
  5. Add the gallery via a shortcode (example: [slidenswap id=”2″ width=”200px” height=”200px”])
sections.faq:
How do I disable the controllers?

Example shortcode: [slidenswap id=”2″ width=”200px” height=”200px” controllers=”false”]
